name: Ninja Record: Sound Hunt
desc:
In the realm of Cosmic Ninjutsu, ever-changing grace,
Hear the echoes of my hunting chase!
Feel the beat, my rhythm's call,
Guitar strums, the atmospheres enthrall.
Bass notes with a tender hue,
Electro-acoustic kindles anew.
Sweat's testament, truth untold,
Every twist and turn, melodies unfold.
My sound ascends, reaching high,
Through bruises and battles, I never shy.
The Dazzling! The Dazzling! A chant so bold.
The Dazzling! The Dazzling! In tales untold,
The Dazzling! The Dazzling! An epic foretold!
Yo. Yo. In this wild world. Let the hearts go ablaze.
Sing out loud, chant your soul, and let's embrace the utter craze!

ranks.desc: Increases the wearer's Max HP by #1[i]%. When losing or restoring this unit's HP, increases CRIT DMG by #2[i]%, lasting for #3[i] turn(s). This effect can only trigger once per turn.
